author: Douglas Ankrah
description: A passion fruit and vanilla crowd-pleaser that's balanced with zesty lime, often served with sparkling wine on the side.
name: Porn Star Martini
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and cut 2 fresh passion fruits in half, SCOOP out the seeds and flesh of 3 halves into your shaker
(Keep last passion fruit half for garnish
) Add next four ingredients (all but champagne), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
Optionally, separately, POUR champagne into chilled shot glass to serve on the side
Instruct drinker to sip alternately from each glass
